name: NPR
text:
From the adoption of a teenage daughter to the birth of a baby boy, here are a few of the best things that happened to @NPRItsBeenAMin listeners this week.

Check out the podcast at https://t.co/uq1X48zQdp. https://t.co/2YuA4kGMga

name: NPR
text:
Stephania Ergemlidze has been bringing a portable basketball hoop to protests. 

"Obviously, basketball is not going to solve the problem," she says. "We were more looking towards trying to ease the tension ... that way, maybe messages can get across." https://t.co/P3bwgH0Wsc

name: NPR
text: "I don't necessarily agree with defunding police," says Memphis Police Association President Michael Williams, but he agrees "whole-heartedly" that the city's budget isn't equitably spread to address the needs of the people of Memphis. https://t.co/zvjVUy02SR
